name: Xaitron
description:
PLEASE don't play this game if you are epileptic!

Xaitron it's my first game so don't expect too much! Oh! and it was made with Game Maker.

The game is only in SPANISH, sorry!

CONTROLS:

  • Press A, D to move and W to jump.
  • Press SPACE BAR or LEFT CLICK (only BOSS FIGHT) to shoot.
  • Press R to reset the level.
  • Press ENTER to reset the game.
  • Press ESCAPE to close the game.
  • Press F9 to take pictures.
  • Press F4 to change between fullscreen and windowed mode.
  • Press F1 to see this info and more in game.

ADVICES: 

  • Some SQUARES are TROLL or can be SHOOTED in any level.
  • Same goes for some SPIKES.
  • In a level you have INFINITE jumps.

EXTRA: 

  • In all levels there are is a shortcut.
